articles.title: "I Walked Out Of My Crease...": Australia Star Makes Stunning Jonny Bairstow Revelation From First A.. - NDTV Sports
articles.description: According to Australia batter Travis Head, Jonny Bairstow had tried to dismiss him in the Edgbaston Test exactly the same way as Alex Carey did in the Lord's Test.
articles.content: Since the controversial dismissal of England wicket-keeper batter Jonny Bairstow on Day 5 of the Lord's Test, the cricketing fraternity is divided in deciding if it was right for Australia to play by… [+1934 chars]

articles.title: India Raises Pro-Khalistani Posters; 'Unacceptable,' Says Canada Foreign Minister - The Wire
articles.description: 'We have already requested our partner countries like Canada, the US, the UK and Australia where sometimes Khalistani activities happen, not to give space to Khalistanis,' Jaishankar said.
articles.content: New Delhi: India has raised the issue of posters appearing in Canada with the photos and names of Indias top diplomats with the Canadian government. Canada’s foreign minister Mélanie Joly has noted t… [+2211 chars]

articles.title: ‘Depends on how flat the wickets get’ – Pat Cummins, when asked if Australia will use Mankads and underarm bowling | Ashes 2023 - Wisden
